dct_description_sm: John Seller is the only name listed in title cartouche.
Unchanged except names added to title cartouche: by J. Seller, J. Colson, W. Fisher, J. Atkinson, & J. Thornton.
"English and French Leagues 20 to one degree"

Engraved by: Dundee sculp (lower left). California as an island on second Sanson model with indented northern coast and many points and islands named.Sea chart of the Pacific showing the West coast of America from Straits of Magellan to Fretum Anian and Agubela de Cato to north of California. Iapan, The Land of Eso, and "Companies Land" are to the west.Copperplate engraved.Include scale measurements in English, French, Dutch, and Spanish.
by John Seller Hydrographer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie
